files.name: main.py
files.content:
# Peterson, Holly 

number = int(input("Enter a number (0 to exit) : "))

while (number != 0): 
    
    counter = number
    factorial = number
    
    while (counter > 1):
        
        print( factorial, 'x', counter - 1 )
        factorial = factorial*(counter - 1)
        counter = counter - 1         
         
    if (number > 0): print(number,"factorial is",factorial)
    
    if (number < 0): print ("Error:  Must be greater than 0")
        
    print("")
    
    number = int(input("Enter a number (0 to exit) : "))

print ("Done.")
